actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 18 of the United States Code to penalize the seeking or acceptance of clemency in furtherance of a scheme to obstruct justice.

summary.text: Establishes a fine of not more than $5,000, or a prison term of not more than 5 years, or both, for the seeking or acceptance of clemency in furtherance of a scheme to obstruct justice.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 18 of the United States Code to penalize the seeking or acceptance of clemency in furtherance of a scheme to obstruct justice.
